text: @realDonaldTrump The same media that you call fake news & blamed for spreading the covid19 hoax ? But now you need every1 of them & said u hated to unite against the enemy of the world ?  To beat it ? I think they have been united from day dot in fighting this enemy ? ( IT'S YOU ) That hasn't?🤔
